attributes.title: Please get this off the Apple store
attributes.review:
This is my review;

for some odd reason it asked me to enter my credit card information and social security number, and so i did, because itâ€™s just an app, what would happen? afterwards putting it in, in exactly 2 minutes, my bank called me and asked me about suffrage charges. i tired to get me in my back account but it wouldnâ€™t let me in, i tired to stop it but i couldnâ€™t do anything. my bank app kept getting notifications of my bank draining out my money. soon enough my bank account got me locked out, this all happened in a matter of 10 minutes. when after this happened police showed up my door and arrested for unknown reasoning, i couldnâ€™t contact anyone, and now i have a lawsuit against me that my lawyer canâ€™t get through. it all started with this app, i cant believe our president would do this to me.

attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.title: This app broke my phone
attributes.review: I got the app see what everyone was talking about the app took 9 hours to download and I could not use it at all during the process. Once the app finally finished and I opened the app it started glitching like crazy and causing my phone to vibrate like crazy and it really scared me, and on top of all that it was blaring a super loud ringing noise. I think this app brought a virus to my phone. My phone keep glitching and ringing for almost the whole day and I could not get it to stop I could not even shut off my phone because it would no let me do anything else. My phone started to over heat one crazy and became to hot to hold in my hands. It finally stopped but my phone went off and I could not get it turned on and charging it would not help. I had to go get my phone fixed and it cost me $760ğŸ˜¡. Donâ€™t get this app it will brake your phone.
